articles.title: T. rex’s ancestors may have walked from Asia to North America - Earth.com
articles.description: Researchers trace T. rex origins to Asia and megaraptors to Gondwana. Climate changes and predator extinction fueled their rise as predators.
articles.content: A new study led by UCL researchers has traced the roots of Tyrannosaurus rex back to Asia. Before ruling North America as a colossal predator, T. rex likely crossed a land bridge from Asia more than … [+4834 chars]
